abstract: It doesn’t seem to, at least according comparisons of price and broadband penetration in developing countries around the world.

lead_paragraph: Update | 4:19 p.m., May 27Justin Wolfers gives a nice explanation of the data over at Freakonomics.

headline.main: Does Lowering the Price of Broadband Increase Its Use?
